title: Here’s Why Pharmacy Stocks Are a Bargain Right Now - Ep 21
itunes:title: Here’s Why Pharmacy Stocks Are a Bargain Right Now - Ep 21
description:
Judging by how pharmacy and drug-distribution stocks have performed the last several years, you'd think they were on the edge of going out of business. But nothing is further from the truth. Hear Vitaliy explain what makes these stocks a great buy in today's market.

You can read this article online at: https://contrarianedge.com/heres-why-pharmacy-stocks-are-a-bargain-right-now/

Disclosure: Read this before you buy your next stock
